outline:
1. to be subtle, be shrewd, be crafty, beware, take crafty counsel, be prudent
    1. (Qal) to be crafty, be subtle
    2. (Hiphil) to be crafty, be or become shrewd
kjv_def: [idiom] very, beware, take crafty (counsel), be prudent, deal subtilly.
strongs_def: properly, to be (or make) bare; but used only in the derivative sense (through the idea perhaps of smoothness) to be cunning (usually in a bad sense)
